channel.title: Couple Questions
channel.description:
Hey right now I'm stuck on how to do a couple things. If you could help i would apprecite it lot. Thank You.
[b]Source:[/b]Bronze Age
[b]Interface:[/b] How Would I Make a Interface to Display Good Monsters To Kill.
[b]Command:[/b] Could Someone Give Me a Code For ::master I Dont Have One.
[b]Command:[/b] Could Someone Give Me ::yell Code.
Thanks.

item.title: Couple Questions
item.dc:creator: @prison190 prison190
item.description:
@prison190 wrote:

nice yell but does not support a muted person such as this one does.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
if (!muted) {
if (playerRights == 0) {
yell("@red@[Player] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
} else if (playerRights == 1) {
yell("@whi@[Mod] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
} else if (playerRights == 2) {
yell("@yel@[Admin] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
}
else if (donator == 1) {
yell("@gre@[Donator] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Prison190”)) {
yell("@blu@[Owner/Coder] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“blank”)) {
yell("@gre@[Forum Owner] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“blank”)) {
yell("@blu@[Co-Owner] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));

} if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("blank")) {
	yell("[Co-Owner] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
} else if (playerRights ==4){
	yell("[Player] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
}

} else {
	sM("You Are Muted, So You Can't Yell.");
	}

} [/code]

This is for a delta, i dont have your source and dont know if it is a delta or just a regular 317.

Read full topic

item.title: Couple Questions
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

For your interface

} if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mobs4killing") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("TEXT", 8144); //Title sendQuest("TEXT", 8145); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("TEXT", 8148); sendQuest("TEXT", 8149); sendQuest("TEXT", 8150); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("TEXT"); }

Master Command

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 3) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); } }

Yell Command

[code=cmf]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@yel@[Moderator]-@red@";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@whi@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@yel@[Mod/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@whi@[Owner/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@gre@[Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@yel@[Mod/Super Donator]-@red@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Super Donator]-@red@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@whi@[Owner/Super Donator]-@whi@ ";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));[/code]

Read full topic
